title: iada and reporting
body:
http://imgur.com/LIZLdb4
Honestly, I did try my best (because I usually play support) and after the game, he/she says this :
iAda : ur mom died wukong
I don't know if she/he just said it for fun. (Which is highly unlikely because he specifically directed it towards me.)
I'm not complaining about abusive language / verbal abuse because i couldn't care about what people say. But I do care when people can't see how hard i'm trying.
Oh and i accidentally reported a report half finish (on the new client) because I wanted to write on a new line, so I shift + enter but that just sent that straight away. So i think Reporting a Player should have shift + enter for a new line. (The boards should also have a feature where you can just copy and paste images into the discussion.)
